website_summaries.verdict: Flexing your tennis skills on cross courts using shoes that come light on the budget? New Balance got you covered with the 696 v4. It allows you to tackle and perfect those backhand, forehand, and groundstroke shots with the much-needed support.It won’t drag your foot down as it comes even lighter than the third-generation model. Plus, its amply cushioned midsole and durable mesh with synthetic cover will give you the protection and stability with comfortable mobility.
pros: As per a significant sum of players, the New Balance 696v4 offers decent support and stability
Many wearers state that the shoe is comfortable and doesn’t need a long break-in time
It’s one of the noticeably breathable tennis trainers by New Balance
Several users find this athletic shoe extremely light
Gratified wearers consider this all-court shoe an excellent value for money
cons: According to several buyers, the 696 v4 feels tighter than expected
More than a few reviewers disclose that this footwear doesn’t have enough space in the toe box

customer_reviews.title: Not for a serious tennis player
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my high school son to replace his last pair of tennis shoes (KSwiss) and he wore these 1 1/2 months! He plays at least two hours of tennis 5 days a week, but these are not well made shoes. I would not purchase again. Back to the tennis center to invest in a better shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, I followed the advice and ordered one size larger than I normally wear. This shoe fits great, supports my feet and feels comfortable. I have immediately ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: aventur

customer_reviews.title: Had to go up a half-size to get the right length
customer_reviews.text: One of the few tennis shoes that come in half-sizes and multiple widths. Very light, very dresscode-compliant. Material breathes well enough and the sole seems durable for hardcourt play. My only complaint is that I had to go up half a size to get the right length; 10.5 to 11.
customer_reviews.author: T. W.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The majority of my shoes are New Balance and this is a half size too small compared to my regular size. Shoe seems good enough, a bit on the light side.
customer_reviews.author: xylopia

customer_reviews.title: The size is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I have used New Balance shoes for years because they have wide sizes. I have always bought a size 13 and I once again ordered a size 13. I guess the manufacturer must have changed because the size 13 is now to short. I tried to convince myself that they were OK and that I would gradually work into them as they loosened up but this hasn't happened. I should have returned them immediately but I didn't. Now it is to late as I have worn them two times resulting in hurt feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for Pickleball shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes for Pickleball etc! They are lightweight and yet sturdy, and I like the sole design and their comfort. As others said in prior reviews, they run a bit small. I got a half-size larger than usual, and they work. I mighta been good with a full size larger. Nice shoes for the price! Update: Still would probably buy again but we’ll see because the insoles suck. The 3rd time I played in them, it was hot and I sweat a lot playing for 2 hours in SW Florida. The insoles slid and bunched up after they got wet. I’ve replaced them with some more rigid ones I had. I expect this will fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a fan of New Balance for my racquetball requirements. Saw that they had come out with a rubber “gum sole” style and, taking the advice of others, bought one size up in length and width. 11W->11.5XW Not enough. My last NBs fit fine. These are painfully narrow. I’m hoping a stretcher will allow me to fit in these. Grrr
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but runs short
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, all New Balance tennis shoes run a half size short. I always wear Size 8 sneakers but ordered these in Size 8.5 instead and they were perfect. They are the same length as other sneakers I have that are Size 8. The other reviewers are correct in stating that you must go up a half size on these. Otherwise, they are a good-looking and comfortable shoe at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: kimina2

customer_reviews.title: Not X Wide
customer_reviews.text: Normally, new balance fit well, but the extra wide is not their regular 4E size. avoid if you have wide feet. new balance used to be consistent between shoes, but now they are all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: A West

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews address this but for some reason these seem to run small. I normally would get a (men's) 9 wide but ordered a 9.5 extra wide and the fit is perfect. The shoe is great. I play pickle ball and the the shoe is really comfortable and I feel very stable in it. I just got this a week ago so can't speak to durability. Unless it falls apart in the next few weeks this is what I would buy next time.
customer_reviews.author: Pecos Ron

customer_reviews.title: I’ve purchased before.  Not same shoe
customer_reviews.text: THese are not the same as previous ones I have owned. Seems to be made of hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: JL HIRSCH

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Since New Balance seemed to have made their court shoes smaller over the last several years, I ordered one size larger and one width wider. The shoes fit great and the seams have been stitched together fairly well. The shoes arrived on time and were as described.
customer_reviews.author: DrJohnnay

customer_reviews.title: Janky
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap shoes. Tennis shoes are supposed to be very durable... my son wore theem to one tennis match and they were trashed. The material they are made from is awful... it feels like soft plastic. If you’re wanting these to walk to the mailbox then go for it. Don’t purchase if you’re wanting them for tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for playing tennis
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son, a high school junior. His shoes are regular size not wide width. For this pair, I ordered wide width. It works good to him. it is white color. He likes the color and the style.
customer_reviews.author: N.G

customer_reviews.title: Not a standard New Balance 4E
customer_reviews.text: I have been cursed with size 9 4E feet. New Balance has always been my go to shoe for wide widths. This shoe was probably a 2E width wise. I have shoe width stretchers so I was able to stretch them out enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: scottonbike

customer_reviews.title: Ran small
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoe but it runs small and narrow. I ordered my usual size in wide width. Did not bother to order another pair in a larger size at this time.
customer_reviews.author: mary s.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for pickleball. These are great shoes in a hard to find size. Extra wide with a 12 1/2 size. Thank you Amazon and New Balance for making these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and well made
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and supportive. I play pickleball where there are quick starts and stops. The shoe is very grippy on the surface to assure firm footing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My son has very wide feet and we can’t find shoes with his size but wide enough for him not to complain. We’re very glad to find this one. The extra wide model fits him just well! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: X wide in parts.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. and great sole with good traction. glad I got the X wide. They narrow quickly at the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Betcha

customer_reviews.title: Room for inserts
customer_reviews.text: First, thanks to other reviewers on tips to order a little larger. I'd say to order 1/2 size larger. For those who have custom shoe inserts for high arches, the as-bought sole was easy to remove and left plenty of vertical space for foot. I was happy enough with the fit that i went ahead and bought a second pair on the expectation that they'll perform and wear okay too...
customer_reviews.author: Indiana user

customer_reviews.title: Great value court shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but sturdy / well built shoe. Extra wide size fits wide feet very well. Green sole is a great color (green being my favorite). Bought same shoe in a different color prior using if for pickleball. Have fun, stay safe, and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Size is not as shown
customer_reviews.text: I used order 6 1/2 4E - it used to fit perfect. Meanwhile they stopped 6 1/2 4E. Now they started again. I ordered but it is not as used to be. It is not fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I always take a 9.5 W in New Balance shoes but that size is too small in this shoe. Exchanging for a 10w.
customer_reviews.author: MHS

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t comfortable upon trying
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t comfortable upon trying them on compared to other 4E New balance models I own. Returned at once.
customer_reviews.author: Malagabee

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Men's 696 V4 Hard Court Tennis Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good quality New Balance shoe. Bit stiff, but works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I am always 11.5. I have other New Balance tennis that are 11.5 and fit me well. This pair was too small, I guess the issue is with this model. Had to return them. Return costed more than what Amazon was willing to reimburse me for shipping. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: too small needed to be at least 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.author: Robert Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I did order a 1/2 size larger and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Balance is the only pair of shoes I wear on the court.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has been a good fit for me. This is my second pair of this style. I"m on the court alot, both indoor and out. Nice comfortable feel and wears nice. I'll always keep a pair as back up.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: These are great all around. Lightweight, sturdy, very nice shape. Order half size bigger than you might normally. X wide fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas s cooper

customer_reviews.title: Size is not right.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 shoe. I ordered a 10. I should have definitely ordered a 10.5 or an 11. I decided to play an hour of tennis with the new shoes. My thought is that it would stretch - it did not. I should have sent them back before playing an hour, my big toes would have thanked me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Insoles
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. However, do yourself a favor and buy different insoles right away. The ones that come in these are very thin and move around alot.
customer_reviews.author: Sally P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for Pickleball -see my note about fit
customer_reviews.text: Listened to others reviewers and ordered half size larger-fit well. Fine shoe for Pickleball. Only New Balance offers 4E width-God love them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small so order up. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the lightweight comfort of this shoe! Ordered a half size up and double xtra width 9.5WW. Normally wear 9W. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: mrs. harris

customer_reviews.title: Size runs 1/2 size too small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe , but runs small ,definitely get at least a 1/2 size larger than what you normally wear
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Pickleball shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad that I read the reviews. A half size larger in wide. Theses shoes feel great!! No shoe-icide here.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great show for the price
customer_reviews.text: I need a large shoe. 154E. This pair is perfect. Nice big too box. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Harris

customer_reviews.title: The size is smaller than it should be!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size! The size is smaller than it should be!
customer_reviews.author: David Nanobashvili

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but you must buy 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected as long as you buy a half size larger than normal. Comfy and lightweight. Time will tell how durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny L

customer_reviews.title: Sub NewBalance quality
customer_reviews.text: Plastic feel & Run about a 1/2 size big. They don’t feel like typical new balance quality
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Pro tennis quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for tennis. Very light, breathable shoes. Great support in the ankle and heel. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mike DePalmer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Order larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but they run small. I wear size 13 but returned them for size 14.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cook

customer_reviews.title: Toe height
customer_reviews.text: While it was wide enough, as all NB's are, the toe area did not have enough height, thereby crunching the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits - plays well on hard service
customer_reviews.text: Fits - used to play pickleball on outdoor asphalt surfaces. Seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Brun

customer_reviews.title: snug fit even with wide shoe width
customer_reviews.text: well made, looks great snug fit but its probably because its a tennis shoe
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lovendahl

customer_reviews.title: Sole wear
customer_reviews.text: Fits good but the sole shows guite a little wear already
customer_reviews.author: paul vetos

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: After wearing them for about a hour my feet hurt
customer_reviews.author: brad merideth

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Mch696r4 Tennis Shoe
feature_bullets: Full-length Ndurance outsole provides superior traction and durability to help get more wear out of the shoe
Herringbone-pattern outsole for added traction during lateral movements
